page.title: 05TRADE NEW SUPERMARKET
page.content: The main{trade}feature of{Ferndown}at present is the development of a big{ new{Tesco Supermarket}and multi-storey {car park,}being constructed by Taylor Woodrow. I interviewed the Foreman and obtained the following information: they started in September 1984 and hope to be finished and opened by November of this year (1985). Mr Symonns, the Foreman, said this would be a good opening time because of Christmas shoppers. The building covers approximately 38,000 hectares, the{library}occupying 1,500 hectares of this. It took three years to obtain building permission. The whole project came about because the{Council}wanted to make a more modern town centre for Ferndown. They asked thirteen architects to submit plans, chose the best, and put the project into action.
